title: Germany 1920s in color, Cologne to Kevlaar  [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
description:
I colorized, restored  and created sound design for this video of Cologne to Kevlaar, Germany 1920s, Embark on the bustling streets of Cologne to the charming town of Kevlaar. Immerse yourself in the cultural vibrancy and architectural wonders that defined this era, capturing the essence of a bygone time.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

B&W Video Source: arkivkopia
B&W Video Source: https://arkivkopia.se/sak/filmark-FASE10-01352
